column8: The year was 1995 , the place , Jackson , Mississippi . Having spent ten hours on a bus , during which I had to twice violate my personal rule against relieving myself on board a moving vehicle , I finally arrived at the fourth annual Dixie-Trek convention only to find that my idol Wil Wheaton decided he had better things to do than to show up and sign my action figure .
